main

Class RmiClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • main.RmiClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GossipCallbacks, Serializable, Remote

    public class RmiClient
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements GossipCallbacks
    Implementazione di GossipCallbacks, interfaccia che definisce le callback a disposizione del server.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrea
    See Also:
    GossipCallbacks, Serialized Form
